name: better-npm-init
description: A better version of npm init, with templates and more. Usage: better-npm-init <template> [--yarn] [--install] [--git] [--yes] [--help]

scripts.test-js-noargs: rm -rf test-template && mkdir test-template && cd test-template && better-init javascript
scripts.test-ts-noargs: rm -rf test-template && mkdir test-template && cd test-template && better-init typescript
scripts.test-express-noargs: rm -rf test-template && mkdir test-template && cd test-template && better-init express
scripts.test-next-noargs: rm -rf test-template && mkdir test-template && cd test-template && better-init next
scripts.test-discord-noargs: rm -rf test-template && mkdir test-template && cd test-template && better-init discord
scripts.test-react-noargs: rm -rf test-template && mkdir test-template && cd test-template && better-init react
scripts.test-angular-noargs: rm -rf test-template && mkdir test-template && cd test-template && better-init angular
scripts.test-noargs: rm -rf test-template && mkdir test-template && cd test-template && better-init

author: Exortions <https://github.com/Exortions>
